name: Plunder Run
description:
Destroy the arrogant authoritarian towers encroaching on your Pirate turf in this top-down shooter.

Created by Nathaniel Sticco and Levi Fink.

2D Art couresy of Kenney: https://kenney.nl/assets/bit-pack

Music courtesy of Ross Bugden: https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=hVBgKCYrI-c
